name: Rum Story Keeper
movement: 20 ft. walking, 10 ft. climbing, 10 ft. swimming
description: A tiny fey creature embodying both mischief and a penchant for intoxicating fun. Known for its vibrant stories and chaotic demeanor.
memorable: Notable for its storytelling abilities that empower allies and debilitate foes, as well as its Aura of Drunkenness.
goals: To spread chaos and mischief, often through storytelling and intoxication.
relations: Often found among other Rum Gremlins, serving as a supportive ally and manipulator in battles.
environment: Typically found in taverns, festivals, or chaotic party environments.
strengths: Strong magical resistance and the ability to poison foes, affecting the battlefield dynamics.
weaknesses: Low hit points and armor class, making it vulnerable in direct confrontations.
attacks: Can perform a Mug Slap for bludgeoning and poison damage, and a Rum Splash for ranged poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Drunkenness, affecting all creatures within its radius with potential poisoning effects.
skills: Has a passive Perception of 11 but weak in Wisdom, making it susceptible to certain effects.
additional_information: Can cast spells to enhance its manipulative abilities
Uses stories to empower rum gremlins
Constitutes a tricky foe on the battlefield
spellcasting: Casts spells as a Charisma-based spellcaster, including prestidigitation at will, and charm person and mirror image three times per day.
test_queries: tiny fey creature with storytelling powers
gremlin that poisons with drunken aura
rum gremlin with powerful magical resistance
